description: An adversary may compress or encrypt data that is collected prior to exfiltration using 3rd party utilities Author: frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Command line parameter combinations that contain all included strings
name: Compress Data and Lock With Password for Exfiltration With 7-ZIP
query: (process.command_line:(*7z.exe* OR *7za.exe*) AND process.command_line:*\ \-p* AND process.command_line:(*\ a\ * OR *\ u\ *))
